DOC.brief_summary: A phase II randomize , placebo control study evaluate efficacy Eurycomalongifoliawater extract ( Physta® ) +Multivitamin quality life mood 86 healthy adult 24 week supplementation period .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect Study Product Quality Life Mood
DOC.criteria: Healthy subject ≥ 25 ≤ 65 year age . Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18 ≤30 kg/m2 . Subjects must employ job/position degree responsibility experience midlevel stress work . Subjects score ≤ 18 Tension subscale score ≤ 14 Fatigue subscale POMS Questionnaire . Judged Investigator general good health basis medical history . Females childbearing potential must agree use appropriate birth control method study . Understands study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator Understands study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator Subjects history immune system disorder autoimmune disorder include limited following : *AIDS , HIV , Ankylosing Spondylitis , Chronic Fatigue Syndrome , CREST syndrome , Crohn 's disease , Dermatomyositis , Fibromyalgia , Grave 's disease , Hashimoto 's Thyroiditis , Lupus , Multiple Sclerosis , Myasthenia Gravis , Pernicious Anemia , PolyarteritisNodosa , Primary Biliary Cirrhosis , Psoriasis , Reynaud 's Syndrome , Rhematoid Arthritis , Sarcoidosis , Scleroderma , Sjogren 's Syndrome , Temporal Arthritis , Ulcerative Colitis , Vitiligo Use immunosuppressive drug last 12 month ( include steroid biologics ) Any significant GI condition would severely interfere evaluation study product include limited inflammatory bowel disease ( Ulcerative Colitis Chron 's ) , history frequent diarrhea , history surgery weight loss ( include gastric bypass lapband ) , history perforation stomach intestine , gastroparesis , clinically important lactose intolerance Any active infection , infection last month require antibiotic , antiviral medication , hospitalization History presence cancer prior two year , except nonmelanoma skin cancer . Subjects history seizure Recent history ( within 12 month ) strong potential alcohol substance abuse . Participation clinical study exposure nonregistered drug product within 30 day prior . Subject use herbal product contain androgenic/anxiolytic activity within 30 day ( one month washout allow ) Individual condition Investigator believe would interfere ability provide inform consent , comply study protocol , might confound interpretation study result put person undue risk . Including subject Bed wheelchairbound Untreated unstable Hypothyroidism Subjects active eat disorder include anorexia nervosa , bulimia , and/or obsessive compulsive eating disorder Central Neurological disorder include limited Spinal cord injury , multiple sclerosis , Parkinson 's disease Pregnant , lactating , plan become pregnant unwilling use adequate contraception duration study .
